text: Cun ʙo Alloh ahdu pajmon ʙasted jo ki ʙo mardum, pas agar on ahdu pajmonaton muxolifi kitoʙi Alloh va sunnati pajomʙar naʙoşad, ʙa on vafo kuned va cun savgand xūrded ʙa'di ta'kid soxtan, onro naşikaned, ki şumo Allohro ʙar xudaton nigahʙon gardonidaed va hamono Alloh medonad, ki cī mekuned. Va har kasero muvofiqi nijat va maqsadaş çazo xohad dod
